item.description:
Wine Tasting Lee NH.

Saturday Jan. 19th., 2pm.   Limit of 20 people.

Flag Hill Winery & Distillery 297 N. River rd. Lee NH. 03861

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net Cost: $8.

If you couldn't join us before this event to welcome the troops home?  Than please join Steve Ob1. and friends after he does the event. "welcomes our troops home". Join us for an hour or so of wine tasting, liqueurs tasting, and tour all for $8.. We will have our own room for the wine tasting. But, Steve Ob1. needs a head count. So, please RSVP ASAP for this. The cut off for the wine tasting will be 12 noon Saturday. We will be at the winery for about an hour or so.  Then I plan to do a walk at Rye beach NH. a few mile from the winery.

www.flaghill.com  603-659-2949

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Wine Tasting Lee NH.
